page.title: 03Village Services
page.content: Amongst the village services for Collingbourne Kingstone the petrol filling station must rank as the most important as villagers mainly rely on private vehicles for transportation. The filling station supplies the only petrol for a five mile radius and also carries out general repairs as well as selling used cars. The only competition in petrol sales was formerly at Everleigh but this closed down early l985 along with the adjoining cafe. The fire, police and ambulance services covering both villages are run on a regional basis. Despite most houses having their own telephone, there is a public telephone booth in each village.
